籤詩版本二:
Sekwephuzile ukungena nokuphuma ukuyofuna iseluleko, ukhathazekile futhi ukhathazekile ngokudala inkinga
Njengenyoni endizela ogibeni, kungathatha isikhathi esingakanani ukubaleka?
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokugcina izinto ezindala nokujwayela ukudalelwa.
Konke akugculisi.
解曰: Yiba olinganiselayo nganoma yisiphi isikhathi. Ilinde isicukuthwane sifike. Uma ubuza ngakho konke. Okubalulekile kuzoba sekwephuzile.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ji Ping wabulawa
U-Ji Ping, ogama lakhe langempela u-Ji Tai, owaziwa nangokuthi u-Ping, wayengudokotela wasebukhosini oBukhosini bakwa-Han.
Ngonyaka wesihlanu kaJian'an (200 AD), uCao Cao waba undunankulu futhi akazange amthathele phezulu umbusi. ukususa u-Cao Cao, wazizwa ecasukile futhi ethukuthele. Ekhathazekile, wagula.
U-Emperor Xian ucele udokotela wasebukhosini u-Ji Ping ukuthi aphathe u-Cao Cao. U-Ji Ping wafunda umyalo oyimfihlo wombusi futhi wayezimisele ukuqeda uCao Cao, ngakho bobabili bakha icebo ndawonye. Kungazelelwe, izindonga zinezindlebe.Isigqila sasekhaya sikaDong Cheng, uQin Qingtong, washaywa amahlandla angamashumi amane ngenduku nguDong Cheng ngenxa yokujola nenkosikazi encane kaDong Cheng.Wabamba amagqubu.Kuthe uma ezwa ngalokhu wabika uDong Cheng futhi wabika ukuthi Ji Ping kuCao Cao.
U-Ji Ping wasebenzisa leli khanda lika-Cao Cao futhi wamdlisa ushevu ngasese. UCao Cao wathola ithiphu, wabamba uJi Ping, wamhlukumeza, wabe esephenya umholi. UJi Ping wamelana nokufa futhi wafa ngemva kokuthinta izinyathelo.
聖意: Umuzi uzikhathazile, isikhohlakali sicela imali, ibhizinisi libhidlikile, umshado awumude, isijeziso siyisithupha, ohamba ngezinyawo uvaleleke ebaleni, konakele umswenya, kutholakala imfuyo eyisithupha, umuntu utholakele, icala lomphakathi liyalahleka, ukufuduka akunyakazi, impahla ilahlekile, isifo senziwe, inethi intaba, ithuna lifile,
